cpl.readme:
! QRCode svg format

<$qrcode />

<$qrcode renderType="text" text="这是一个二维码" avatarSrc="https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/72405338?v=4" />

!! Params

* `renderType`: {'url'|'text'} 当前条目地址
* `text`: string
* `width`: number

!! TODO

* viewtoolbar
* support icon(logo), color https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode/issues/240, https://github.com/ushelp/EasyQRCodeJS-NodeJS

!! Credits

* https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode
